selections.name: S K Eagle
selections.reason: Coming off a strong win at this track and distance on Jan 27. Maintains same weight and draws well outside to avoid kickback.

selections.name: Ka Noa Lady
selections.reason: Consistent performer who finished 2nd last start. Good speed figures (60) two starts back suggest she is a major player.

selections.name: Gortys
selections.reason: Solid 3rd last time out. Competitive in this class and represents good value.

danger_horse.name: Gortys
danger_horse.reason: Morning line favorite (3/1) with consistent form, though finished behind our top pick recently.
